sense.definition: indicating a participating entity/thing in an action/activity (e.g., talk with Joe, merge with traffic)
indicating spatial accompaniment / proximity (e.g., he is with the bike)
indicating the group in a member-of-group relationship (e.g., Joe is with the marines, grouped with alternative medicine)
indicating the means or material used to perform an action or acting as the complement of similar participle adjectives (e.g., crammed with, coated with, covered with)
because of / due to (the physical/mental presence of) (e.g., boiling with anger, shining with dew)
indicating the manner or circumstances (but not cause or motivation) of something (e.g., fix with precision)
expressing a possessive relationship (e.g., the man with the hat)
indicating a part in a part-of-whole relationship (e.g., the man with the broken arm)
connecting an experiencer with some sort of experience, primarly ailments (e.g., person with schizophrenia)
indicating the information content brought to a communication/discussion (e.g., phoned him with the question)
indicating the complement of a cognitive/emotional word (whatever it is oriented toward) (e.g., angry with her)
indicating the complement of an adherence/conformity word (e.g., adheres with, conforms with)
in respect to; in relation to; indicating something(s)/someone(s) towards which some manner of behavior or being exists or is expressed (and doesn't fit elsewhere) (e.g., be polite with her)
in the same direction as (e.g., shave with the grain)
